comments: This contract is a call-up against a Public Works and Government Services Canada procurement tool/Original call-up was for Task 1 - conduct Task 1 (kick-off teleconference). Contract amount increased to include required services for Task 2 (data gap analysis, development of problem formulation, workplan, and expert support engagement) of a detailed quantitative risk assessment on the former recreational vehicle compounds in Canadian Forces Base North Bay located in North Bay, ON.
